name: Winged Gold - The Collector -
description: [ENG] - Series of illustrations with several figures that bring lightness, strength and magnificence, the animated background brings the immeasurable vastness of the space that makes us seem that the work has immense dimensions. - [PT/BR] - Série de ilustrações com varias figuras que trazem leveza, força e imponencia, o fundo animado tras a vastidao imensuravel do espaço que nos faz parecer que a obra tem dimençoes imensas.
